title: Ep. 99 - In Search of a Bottom
itunes:title: In Search of a Bottom
description: Stock analyst Marc Lichtenfeld talks about his new trading service called Oxford Systems Trader.   He also discusses several indicators you should look for to spot a market bottom.
content:encoded: Stock analyst Marc Lichtenfeld talks about his new trading service called Oxford Systems Trader.   He also discusses several indicators you should look for to spot a market bottom.
